Finger Exercise Lecture 18 Write the class according to the specifications below:
class Circle(): def __init__(self, radius): """ Initializes self with radius """ # your code here def get_radius(self): """ Returns the radius of self """ # your code here def __add__(self, c): """ c is a Circle object Returns a new Circle object whose radius is the sum of self and c's radius """ # your code here def __str__(self): """ A Circle's string representation is the radius """ # your code here 6.100L Finger Exercises Lecture 18 Solutions
